title: Katie Price gives tour of mucky mansion with bird poo and knickers strewn on floor and graffitied walls
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Katie Price has given fans a tour of her mucky mansion in her latest YouTube video.

The Horsham home is covered in mess, with bird poo on the floor and stacks of underwear and clothes everywhere.

There is graffiti on the walls and no furniture as she gets the property renovated by a team of builders.

Katie, 41, admits that her house is a mess, saying that just thinking about sorting through all her clutter gives her a "headache".

Her vlog starts with the mum-of-five going into one of her stables, which instead of horses is just full of piles of clothes.

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Youtube)

In the doorway is a big pile of bird poo and she looks up to find that birds have made a mess there.

Katie says: "Instead of a horse there seems like there's some bird s***."

Cobwebs cover the ceilings and her clothes litter the floor, which she plans to sell on eBay.

While she doesn't show them, Katie says there are nine garages in total that are "full of c**p."

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Youtube)

In the open plan kitchen and front room there are even more clothes, with a room for her dog and puppies off to the side.

"It's exhausting to know where to start, which room which pile," Katie says.

"I don't need these clothes and I'm always saying what can I wear? Where do I start?

(Image: Youtube)

(Image: Youtube)

"It just gives me a headache to be honest."

In one of the upstairs rooms a trio of women are going through her suitcase to sort out her stuff to sell.

Katie admits clothes belonging to her youngest children Jett and Bunny have gone mising in all the clutter.
description: Katie, 41, admits that her house is a mess, saying that just thinking about the clutter gives her a 'headache'
